name: warrior
title: Warrior
desc:
This is a fighter with melee attack,
capable for destroying enemy defense
and the one making your ranged 
party members less vulnerable.

name: cleric
title: Cleric
desc:
This is a character that acts both as
a melee combatant and a healer.
Use him to regain hitpoints.

name: ranger
title: Ranger
desc:
This is a ranged attack character,
 having advantage not been directly
 exposed to an enemy fire.
Better safe than sorry.
